body:
Comment 39: 
0xc2003c47d8 would be the stack segment running GC. The location of the Eface is
0x000000c200649ac0.

Anyway, the value of b is 0x000000c200649a20. Doing some poking around, and I can't find
anything out of place there.

If anyone has a place to store a 345 mb core file, I'd be happy to upload it.
